column1: Smoque BBQ////Long overdue review!!! Let me start by saying I don't eat very much meat
column2: but when it comes to Smoque.....my mouth waters and I CRAVE it regularly!! My first of several visits to Smoque was sometime last winter
column3: when it was freezing cold and miserable.  Delicious
column7: and their absolutely AMAZING peach cobbler is just the kind of comfort food I needed to lift my spirits.
